resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Compute IR

cpcloud commented on a change in pull request #11439:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11439#discussion_r732011321



##########
File path: experimental/computeir/Relation.fbs
##########
@@ -197,6 +197,13 @@ table LiteralRelation {
 table Source {
   base: RelBase (required);
   name: string (required);
+  /// An optional list of field indices indicating which columns should be read
+  /// from the source.

Review comment:
       I see, so you'll have `[null, ..., field 0, null, ...,  field 4, ...]`?

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11439#issuecomment-954765375


   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 2ae84e8e90a7c0d8cd37df07d69e982dcfd16eaf and contender = e8270d705da325158291f412235c9c155adceb39. e8270d705da325158291f412235c9c155adceb39 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/13775b715a3a4e6aa99934b70feee020...6243b633326a47e69bc5f0679e4a7b09/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/547df79310fd4d8ea29e2fd6c48aef10...a98263ae56e84b029135bec5ee9c7543/)

   ursa-i9-9960x: langs = Python, R, JavaScript
   ursa-thinkcentre-m75q: langs = C++, Java
   ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2: cloud = True

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: {{Source}} should store a list of columns to read, so that consumers can prune columns and push projections all the way down to the source.
fields.summary: [IR] Add projection list to Source node
